summary: The customer asked about the streaming device they purchased from Contoso Wireless, including how to set it up and use it. The agent explained that the device connects to the home Wi-Fi network and can be used to stream movies, TV shows, music, and more. They also discussed how to use the device, what streaming services are available, and how to rent or purchase digital content. Finally, the agent reminded the customer to keep their streaming apps up-to-date and informed them about potential copyright restrictions on certain content.
